price: Do you not see that they wander aimlessly in every valley[28],
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّهُمۡ فِي كُلِّ وَادٖ يَهِيمُونَ
footnotes: [28] Telling lies indiscriminately, praising some, and disparaging others.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: alam tara annahum fī kulli wādin yahīmūna
